code-table.name: career-appointee-code
code-table.description: A list of codes to indicate if a person is non-career appointee or a Foreign Service officer.

item.label: Served before the passage of the Foreign Service Act of February 5, 1915
item.definition: Appointees are not categorized as “career” or “non-career” before the passage of the Foreign Service Act of February 5, 1915

item.label: Career Foreign Service Officer and Non-career appointee
